title: cryptofrka
author: cryptofrka
created_time: February 04, 2023, 06:01:58 PMLast edit: October 11, 2023, 08:35:39 PM by cryptofrka
content: Sportsbet's BSFL Sign up threadThis is the sign-up thread for Sportsbet's Bitcointalk Sports Fanatics League (BSFL) competition. The competition is run by Cro2 team and if you havenâ€™t already, please visit our main thread before applying. This competition is quite complex and not intended for casuals who will give up after a couple of weeks.The competition is partially free to play, but there is a buy-in fee for the 1st Division spots. First division has the best awards and is intended to be the pinnacle of our competition. This season the buy in is set to 2.5 mBTC. First division spots are not guaranteed, they will be decided after sign up window closes. High ranks and participants of Sportsbet sponsored pools will have and advantage, as well as particularly active/good gamblers from Sportsbet.io. If you are not interested to pay participation fee, you will not be part of First division this season but we will accept your application and place you in 2nd or 3rd Division.We are accepting sign-ups from Full members and above with some exceptions for people coming from Sportsbet.io clubhouse chat.Almost every member will get a portion of the prize pool and the prizes are purposely set like that so that throughout the competition there is always something to play for. For more info about the prizes and everything else visit our main discussion thread.Sign-up window for first division closes on Saturday, February 11th midnight forum time while we are accepting sign ups for lower divisions until 12th of February (also midnight forum time).After the participants are selected, we will paste the escrow wallet here. You will have to pay the participation fee until 12th of February.We will only accept sign-ups and bids in this thread. We won't accept reservations, only complete signups.Please post your application with the following template:Code:Bitcointalk username: your usernameBTC wallet: please use segwit if possible
